title: HOW MANY CITY AND COUNTY EMPLOYEES HAVE CELL PHONES THAT ARE CITY/COUNTY ISSUED AND HOW MUCH DO THEY COST THE CITY/COUNTY ANNUALLY?  THANK YOU, E.C. WILSON
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question about cell phone
use. This answer is the result of multiple phone calls and email
exchanges between reporter Kevin Maurer and the city and county.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12035
